passages.text: Greetings, traveler. My name's Jakob, and I work for the church that you see before you. I see you have a Festival Badge. [[Identify Service]]
passages.name: Start

passages.text: In Ensomme, all fish must be officially recorded by the Church before they can be brought to market. I provide this service. Just bring me your catch, and I'll tag your fish so the fishmonger knows they've been recorded. [[Identify 2]]
passages.name: Identify Service

passages.text: I'll even tell you more about the bounty you have pulled from the sea. Free of charge, of course. [[Identify and record fish|Identify]] [[Leave|Leave]]
passages.name: Identify 2
